docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: This is the home page for Data Hub connector documentation. Select Connectors in the side menu to browse individual connectors.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This site hosts autogenerated documentation for Data Hub connectors.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
1. Sign in to Demo CRM and create an API key.
  2. Enable API access under Settings ▸ Integrations.

docs.title: Connector Setup
docs.text:
Below table lists the fields shown in the connector configuration form.

Field Description API Key Token copied from Demo CRM.

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: Technical Name Type Default Example Description api_key String abc123 API key generated in prerequisites.

docs.title: Task Parameters
docs.text: Technical Name Type Default Example Description timeout Integer 10000 15000 Request timeout in milliseconds.

docs.title: Tables
docs.text:
Table Column Data Type customers - - id String email String created_at Timestamp
